REQUEST TYPE: POST
localhost:3000/contents

# The request JSON contains 3 attributes - title, description and an array of assets_attributes containing all the base64 encoded images in the format - data:image/jpeg;base64,base64 encoded image

REQUEST JSON:

{
	"content": {
		"title": "LIGO experiment",
		"description": "Gravitational Waves",
		"assets_attributes": [{
			"asset": "data:image/jpeg;base64,......
			},
			{ "asset": "data:image/jpeg;base64,......
			}
			]
		}
}

The file will be uploaded to your file system in the public/uploads folder of the rails application.
